title: General Consultation
description: Initial consultation with a general practitioner for general health concerns.

title: Specialist Consultation
description: Initial consultation with a specialist doctor for specific medical concerns.

title: Blood Tests
description: Blood tests to check for various health conditions and illnesses.

title: Vaccinations
description: Vaccinations for common and preventable diseases such as flu, measles, and chickenpox.

title: X-rays
description: Diagnostic imaging to visualize bones and internal organs for medical purposes.

title: Medical Check-up
description: Comprehensive medical check-up with various tests and examinations to assess overall health.
